åˆ—è¡¨1=[] å¯¹äºèŒƒå›´ï¼ˆ10000ï¼‰å†…çš„ iï¼š Normal_samples = np.random.normal(4,9,5) exponential_samples = np.random.exponential(scale=1/lam, size=3) binomial_samples = np.random.binomial(100, 0.1, 3)
